text:
The fabric is incredibly delicate, isn't it?
The colors are like an aurora...

I,
someday, want to see the aurora.

I've seen it in pictures, but...
I wonder if the colors are really like that.

Surely, it must be completely
different to see it in person...

When Haruki stands on stage in that outfit,
I think the audience will feel the same way.

The level of information conveyed changes when you're
there in person, moving and sharing the same space.

It's amazing.
Standing on stage is scary. You can't hide anything...

I wonder how I can shine...
I have to do my best...!
